Paytable.paybackBody: For this game, the long-term, theoretically-expected payback is {RTP}.
Paytable.overallChances: There is a 1 in {odds} overall chance of winning a prize on each play.

Error.genericErrorText: There has been an internal error. EXIT and relaunch the game.

message_win.TRY:
THANKS FOR PLAYING!
YOU COULD HAVE WON

Game.page1Part1: Select the number of tickets to play, the cost per ticket & Press BUY to begin.
Game.page1Part2: Match YOUR TICKETS to LUCKY NUMBERS and win the associated prize.
Game.page1Part3: Reveal a Multiplier Symbol to win the corresponding prize instantly.
Game.page1Part4: Reveal a Gold Coin Symbol to trigger a Mystery Bonus game.
Game.page1Part5: The Gold Coin flips to reveal either Megamatch or Hyperspin Bonus.
Game.page2Part2: Find 3 matching multiplier amounts on any one row to win.
Game.page2Part4: Win the triggering ticket cost multiplied by the total accumulated multipliers.
Game.page3Part2: Revealed multipliers are accumulated in the field above.
Game.page3Part3: Keep spinning until the outer ring lands on COLLECT.
Game.page3Part4: Win the triggering ticket cost multiplied by the total accumulated multipliers.
Game.baseGameInfo:
FIND THE GOLD COIN TO TRIGGER THE MYSTERY BONUS.
PLAY 1 OF 2 POSSIBLE BONUS GAMES!
Game.bonusGameInfo: MATCH 3 OF A KIND IN ANY ROW TO WIN!
